verses.verse: וַיִּקְרָ֖א <WH7121> called אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> unto Moses וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> and spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him מֵאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> unto him out of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> Speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אָדָ֗ם <WH120> unto them If any man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יַקְרִ֥יב <WH7126> of you bring מִכֶּ֛ם <WH4480> at קָרְבָּ֖ן <WH7133> an offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> at הַבְּהֵמָ֗ה <WH929> of the cattle מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבָּקָר֙ <WH1241> [even] of the herd וּמִן־ <WH4480> or הַצֹּ֔אן <WH6629> and of the flock תַּקְרִ֖יבוּ <WH7126> ye shall bring אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבַּנְכֶֽם׃ <WH7133> your offering

אִם־ <WH518> If עֹלָ֤ה <WH5930> [be] a burnt sacrifice קָרְבָּנוֹ֙ <WH7133> If his offering מִן־ <WH4480> from הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> of the herd זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> a male תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> without blemish יַקְרִיבֶ֑נּוּ <WH7126> let him offer אֶל־ <WH413> about פֶּ֝תַח <WH6607> at the door אֹ֤הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> of the congregation יַקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> he shall offer אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> לִרְצֹנ֖וֹ <WH7522> it of his own voluntary will לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וְסָמַ֣ךְ <WH5564> And he shall put יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַ֖ל <WH5921> his behalf רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> upon the head הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> of the burnt offering וְנִרְצָ֥ה <WH7521> and it shall be accepted ל֖וֹ לְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> for him to make atonement עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> his behalf

וְשָׁחַ֛ט <WH7819> And he shall kill אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּ֥ן <WH1121> sons הַבָּקָ֖ר <WH1241> bull לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְ֠הִקְרִיבוּ <WH7126> shall bring בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> Aaron's הַֽכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> and the priests אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֔ם <WH1818> the blood וְזָרְק֨וּ <WH2236> and sprinkle אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּ֤ם <WH1818> the blood עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> is פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> that [is by] the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation
וְהִפְשִׁ֖יט <WH6584> And he shall flay אֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> the burnt offering וְנִתַּ֥ח <WH5408> and cut אֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לִנְתָחֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5409> it into his pieces

וְ֠נָתְנוּ <WH5414> shall put בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> And the sons אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> of Aaron הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <WH3548> the priest אֵ֖שׁ <WH784> fire עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> upon the altar וְעָרְכ֥וּ <WH6186> in order עֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> and lay the wood עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> upon the fire

וְעָרְכ֗וּ <WH6186> in order בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> Aaron's הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> And the priests אֵ֚ת <WH853> הַנְּתָחִ֔ים <WH5409> the parts אֶת־ <WH854> for הָרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> the head וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֑דֶר <WH6309> and the fat עַל־ <WH5921> over הָעֵצִים֙ <WH6086> upon the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> that [is] on the fire אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> over הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> which [is] upon the altar

וְקִרְבּ֥וֹ <WH7130> But his inwards וּכְרָעָ֖יו <WH3767> and his legs יִרְחַ֣ץ <WH7364> shall he wash בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> in water וְהִקְטִ֨יר <WH6999> shall burn הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <WH3548> and the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> all on the altar עֹלָ֛ה <WH5930> [to be] a burnt sacrifice אִשֵּׁ֥ה <WH801> an offering made by fire רֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> savour נִיח֖וֹחַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD ס

וְאִם־ <WH518> if מִן־ <WH4480> is from הַצֹּ֨אן <WH6629> [be] of the flocks קָרְבָּנ֧וֹ <WH7133> And if his offering מִן־ <WH4480> at הַכְּשָׂבִ֛ים <WH3775> [namely] of the sheep א֥וֹ <WH176> or מִן־ <WH4480> at הָעִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> or of the goats לְעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> for a burnt sacrifice זָכָ֥ר <WH2145> it a male תָּמִ֖ים <WH8549> without blemish יַקְרִיבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH7126> he shall bring

וְשָׁחַ֨ט <WH7819> And he shall kill אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> עַ֣ל <WH5921> on יֶ֧רֶךְ <WH3409> it on the side הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <WH4196> of the altar צָפֹ֖נָה <WH6828> northward לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God וְזָרְק֡וּ <WH2236> shall sprinkle בְּנֵי֩ <WH1121> sons אַהֲרֹ֨ן <WH175> Aaron's הַכֹּהֲנִ֧ים <WH3548> and the priests אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמ֛וֹ <WH1818> his blood עַל־ <WH5921> on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וְנִתַּ֤ח <WH5408> And he shall cut אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> לִנְתָחָ֔יו <WH5409> it into his pieces וְאֶת־ <WH854> for רֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> with his head וְאֶת־ <WH853> פִּדְר֑וֹ <WH6309> and his fat וְעָרַ֤ךְ <WH6186> shall lay them in order הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> and the priest אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on הָֽעֵצִים֙ <WH6086> on the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הָאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> that [is] on the fire אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> which [is] upon the altar

וְהַקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> the inwards וְהַכְּרָעַ֖יִם <WH3767> and the legs יִרְחַ֣ץ <WH7364> But he shall wash בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> with water וְהִקְרִ֨יב <WH7126> shall bring הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <WH3548> and the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֹּל֙ <WH3605> all וְהִקְטִ֣יר <WH6999> [it] all and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> [it] upon the altar עֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> it [is] a burnt sacrifice ה֗וּא <WH1931> he אִשֵּׁ֛ה <WH801> an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD פ

וְאִ֧ם <WH518> if מִן־ <WH4480> at הָע֛וֹף <WH5775> [be] of fowls עֹלָ֥ה <WH5930> And if the burnt sacrifice קָרְבָּנ֖וֹ <WH7133> for his offering לַֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> to the LORD וְהִקְרִ֣יב <WH7126> then he shall bring מִן־ <WH4480> from הַתֹּרִ֗ים <WH8449> of turtledoves א֛וֹ <WH176> or מִן־ <WH4480> from בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> or of young הַיּוֹנָ֖ה <WH3123> pigeons אֶת־ <WH853> קָרְבָּנֽוֹ׃ <WH7133> his offering

וְהִקְרִיב֤וֹ <WH7126> shall bring הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> And the priest אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> it unto the altar וּמָלַק֙ <WH4454> and wring off אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשׁ֔וֹ <WH7218> his head וְהִקְטִ֖יר <WH6999> and burn הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חָה <WH4196> [it] on the altar וְנִמְצָ֣ה <WH4680> thereof shall be wrung out דָמ֔וֹ <WH1818> and the blood עַ֖ל <WH5921> on קִ֥יר <WH7023> at the side הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> of the altar

וְהֵסִ֥יר <WH5493> And he shall pluck away אֶת־ <WH853> מֻרְאָת֖וֹ <WH4760> his crop בְּנֹצָתָ֑הּ <WH5133> with his feathers וְהִשְׁלִ֨יךְ <WH7993> and cast אֹתָ֜הּ <WH853> אֵ֤צֶל <WH681> it beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH4196> the altar קֵ֔דְמָה <WH6924> on the east part אֶל־ <WH413> to מְק֖וֹם <WH4725> by the place הַדָּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1880> of the ashes

וְשִׁסַּ֨ע <WH8156> And he shall cleave אֹת֣וֹ <WH853> בִכְנָפָיו֮ <WH3671> it with the wings לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not יַבְדִּיל֒ <WH914> thereof [but] shall not divide [it] asunder וְהִקְטִ֨יר <WH6999> shall burn אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> הַכֹּהֵן֙ <WH3548> and the priest הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חָה <WH4196> it upon the altar עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> upon the wood אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> is on הָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> that [is] upon the fire עֹלָ֣ה <WH5930> it [is] a burnt sacrifice ה֗וּא <WH1931> he אִשֵּׁ֛ה <WH801> an offering made by fire רֵ֥יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹ֖חַ <WH5207> of a sweet לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD ס
